track_strategy: Extend braking points by a minimum of 150 meters and modulate throttle application to mitigate rear axle saturation on the low-mu surface. Utilize a wider geometric line to reduce slip angles and maintain car stability. If track temperature increases, anticipate aquaplaning and prepare for a transition to the intermediate compound; if temperature decreases, expect icing. For any further weather deterioration or accelerated degradation, box immediately for the full wet compound.
